I love traveling because it allows me to have an open mind...
...and it gives me a new perspective on life.
I started my blog because I wanted to help other deaf people to travel...
...and to enjoy traveling as much as I do.
My iPad is one of my traveling companions.
I always have it with me.
iPad has given me the tools that I need to get out there and see the world.
I tell people not to be afraid, to not let anything hold them back.
I never let anything hold me back.
I don't want to miss anything.
